# UBL Semantic Model - Historical Releases

Complete chronological list of all UBL specification versions from 2.0 through 2.5, with direct links to OASIS documentation directories.

**Base URL:** https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/

---

## UBL 2.0 (Released: 2006)

**Note:** All UBL 2.0 stages from first draft (PRD) through official release (OS) are now archived locally with complete GenericCode generated.

| Stage | Directory | Publication Date | Link | Local Archive |
|-------|-----------|------------------|------|---|
| Proposed Recommendation | prd-UBL-2.0 | 2006-01-19 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/prd-UBL-2.0/ | ✅ |
| Proposed Recommendation 2 | prd2-UBL-2.0 | 2006-07-28 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/prd2-UBL-2.0/ | ✅ |
| Proposed Recommendation 3 | prd3-UBL-2.0 | 2006-09-21 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/prd3-UBL-2.0/ | ✅ |
| Proposed Recommendation 3 Revision 1 | prd3r1-UBL-2.0 | 2006-10-05 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/prd3r1-UBL-2.0/ | ✅ |
| Committee Specification | cs-UBL-2.0 | 2006-10-12 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/cs-UBL-2.0/ | ✅ |
| **Official Standard** | **os-UBL-2.0** | **2006-12-12** | **https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/os-UBL-2.0/** | **✅** |
| Official Standard Update | os-update-UBL-2.0 | 2008-05-26 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/os-update-UBL-2.0/ | ✅ |
| Errata | errata-UBL-2.0 | 2008-04-23 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/errata-UBL-2.0/ | ✅ |

---

## UBL 2.1 (Released: 2013)

| Stage | Directory | Publication Date | Link |
|-------|-----------|------------------|------|
| Proposed Recommendation 1 | prd1-UBL-2.1 | 2010-09-25 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/prd1-UBL-2.1/ |
| Proposed Recommendation 2 | prd2-UBL-2.1 | 2011-05-30 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/prd2-UBL-2.1/ |
| Proposed Recommendation 3 | prd3-UBL-2.1 | 2013-02-23 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/prd3-UBL-2.1/ |
| Proposed Recommendation 4 | prd4-UBL-2.1 | 2013-05-14 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/prd4-UBL-2.1/ |
| Committee Specification Draft 4 | csd4-UBL-2.1 | 2013-05-14 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/csd4-UBL-2.1/ |
| Committee Specification 1 | cs1-UBL-2.1 | 2013-06-29 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/cs1-UBL-2.1/ |
| Candidate OASIS Standard 1 | cos1-UBL-2.1 | 2013-07-15 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/cos1-UBL-2.1/ |
| **Official Standard** | **os-UBL-2.1** | **2013-11-04** | **https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/os-UBL-2.1/** |

| Committee Specification Proposed Recommendation Draft 3 | csprd03-UBL-2.2 | 2018-02-21 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/csprd03-UBL-2.2/ |

| Candidate OASIS Standard 01 | cos01-UBL-2.2 | 2018-04-22 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/cos01-UBL-2.2/ |

## UBL 2.3 (Released: 2021)

**Note:** CSD01 and CSD02 were not released publicly. First public release was CSD03.

| Stage | Directory | Publication Date | Link |
|-------|-----------|------------------|------|
| Committee Specification Proposed Recommendation Draft 1 | csprd01-UBL-2.3 | 2019-08-07 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/csprd01-UBL-2.3/ |
| Committee Specification Proposed Recommendation Draft 2 | csprd02-UBL-2.3 | 2020-01-29 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/csprd02-UBL-2.3/ |
| Committee Specification Draft 3 | csd03-UBL-2.3 | 2020-07-29 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/csd03-UBL-2.3/ |
| Committee Specification Draft 4 | csd04-UBL-2.3 | 2020-11-25 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/csd04-UBL-2.3/ |
| Committee Specification 01 | cs01-UBL-2.3 | 2021-01-19 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/cs01-UBL-2.3/ |
| Committee Specification 02 | cs02-UBL-2.3 | 2021-05-25 | https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/cs02-UBL-2.3/ |
| **Official Standard** | **os-UBL-2.3** | **2021-06-15** | **https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/os-UBL-2.3/** |

---

## Summary Statistics

| Version | Total Stages | Locally Archived | GenericCode | Final Status |
|---------|--------------|------------------|-------------|--------------|
| 2.0 | 8 | 8 ✅ | 8 generated | Official Standard (OS) |
| 2.1 | 8 | 8 ✅ | 8 OASIS | Official Standard (OS) |
| 2.2 | 6 | 6 ✅ | 6 OASIS | Official Standard (OS) |
| 2.3 | 7 | 7 ✅ | 7 OASIS | Official Standard (OS) |
| 2.4 | 4 | 4 ✅ | 4 OASIS | Official Standard (OS) |
| 2.5 | 2 | 2 ✅ | 2 OASIS | Committee Specification Draft (CSD02) |
| **Total** | **35** | **35 ✅ (100%)** | **65 GC files** | - |

---

## Notes

- **OS (Official Standard):** Final released version
- **CS (Committee Specification):** Pre-release specification that has completed committee review
- **CSD (Committee Specification Draft):** Draft version under development
- **CSPRD (Committee Specification Proposed Recommendation Draft):** Draft approaching recommendation stage
- **COS (Candidate OASIS Standard):** Candidate for standardization
- **PRD (Proposed Recommendation Draft):** Early proposal stage

Each directory contains:
- HTML documentation
- PDF specification
- XML schemas (XSD)
- Semantic models (XML)
- Code lists
- Alternative representations (JSON, ASN.1 for some versions)

---

**Sources:**
- [OASIS Open UBL Documentation Portal](https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/)
- [GitHub - OASIS UBL Technical Committee Repository](https://github.com/oasis-tcs/ubl)
